    About

    I am a graduate student in the Department of Mechanical and Aerspace Engineering at The Ohio State University, advised by Prof. Bilin Aksun Guvenc. I am passionate about Autonomous Vehicles, and their applications in shaping the transportation of our future.

    Interests:

    • Autonomous Vehicles
    • Optimal Control
    • State Estimation
